name: Isnisia
declaringWar: Your puny empire has been a stain on my maps ever since I've uncovered it. Today I shall paint it a nice shade of blue.
introduction: Greetings, behind me stands the eternal and beautifully efficient Isnisian empire. I wish our nations may never come across eachother.
neutralHello: I yet have plans for your nation.
hateHello: I will burn your empire to the ground.
afterPeace: This war may not have been decisive, yet the next will be.
tradeRequest: I offer this cooperation to benefit both of our regimes.
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Culture] from all [Military Base] buildings
[+1 Culture, +1 Happiness] from all [Military Academy] buildings
[+1 Culture, +2 Happiness, +2 Production] from all [Heroic Epic] buildings
[+1 Culture, +1 Happiness] from [Fort] tiles [in all cities] <within [2] tiles of a [City center]>
[+2 Culture, +2 Happiness, +2 Production] from [Citadel] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Happiness, +1 Culture] [in all cities with a garrison]
